name: 99 Bird Blaster Blitz
description:
99 Bird Blaster Blitz, a fast, furious, addictive, 99 seconds worth of bird blasting fun. Our favorite feathered friends float, bump, bounce, and explode, just like in real life. Blast while they fly or wait for them to pack for higher scores. Multipliers, and larger clusters up your scoring abilities. Flaming birds explode when tapped, taking their neighbors with them. Each bird is rendered in ultra high resolution 3D, chirping away. How fun is that! Need more challenge, invite a friend to play a Shootout, and may the best blaster win. While it's like shooting fish in a barrel, fast, accurate blasting is required for top scores.

Instructions:
Tap a bird, any bird, however, clusters of the same color birds give bigger scores. You've only got 99 Birds at a time, and only 99 seconds to get your maximum score, so use them wisely, strategy, accuracy, and speed are key to maximum scores.

It's time to start blasting ... 99 Bird Blaster Blitz!

Highlights:
Realistic birds balloon active physics.
Shootout w/Friends.
Ultra HD animated bird graphics.
Sequential matching.
Completely freeform packing.
New colors every game.
Dramatic lighting effects.
High score tracker.
Game Statistics.
